metadata.title: Basic Catalog B
metadata.remarks: A basic catalog created to capture basic catalog elements and functionality for interoperability testing.

params.label: An integer value representing the minimum number of total characters required in a password.

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: All passwords must be at least {{ insert: param, B-1.param1 }} character(s) long.

params.label: An integer value representing the minimum number of numerals required in a password.

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: All passwords must include at least {{ insert: param, B-1.param1 }} numeral(s).
